original: @217b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @217b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: nee r'atma de pi panytsa da sha sto tra /
analyzed: nee r'atma de pi panytsa da sha sto tra /
translated: Nairatmyadevipancadasastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga la bstod pa /
analyzed: bdag med ma lha mo bco lnga la bstod pa /
translated: Praise of the Fifteen Goddesses of Nairatmya

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the Blessed Vajraḍāka.

original: mos pa sna tshogs gdul dka' 'dul ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mos pa sna tshogs gdul dka' 'dul ba'i phyir //
translated: In order to tame the difficult to tame, with various inclinations,

original: chos dbyings mi bskyod 'gag pa med pa las //
analyzed: chos dbyings mi bskyod 'gag pa med pa las //
translated: from the unmoving, unobstructed dharmadhātu,

original: thabs kyis sprul pa sna tshogs ston mdzad pa //
analyzed: thabs kyis sprul pa sna tshogs ston mdzad pa //
translated: skillfully manifesting various emanations,

original: ye shes thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ye shes thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the compassionate wisdom one.

original: 'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid aa las skyes //
analyzed: 'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid aa las skyes //
translated: Born from A, the essence of the four wheels,

original: bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa 'jigs pa'i sku //
analyzed: bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon pa 'jigs pa'i sku //
translated: the terrifying form that overwhelms the four māras,

original: mi bskyod dbu brgyan bde ba chen po'i ngang //
analyzed: mi bskyod dbu brgyan bde ba chen po'i ngang //
translated: the essence of great bliss, crowned by Akṣobhya,

original: ye shes mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ye shes mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the assembly of wisdom ḍākinīs.

original: a'a las skyes pa'i mdzes ma rdo rje ma //
analyzed: a'a las skyes pa'i mdzes ma rdo rje ma //
translated: The beautiful Vajrī born from A,

original: rtag tu dgyes pas kha tv'am @218a * //🔽ga la gzigs //
analyzed: rtag tu dgyes pas kha tv'am @218a * // ga la gzigs //
translated: always delighted, holding a khaṭvāṅga,

original: gdug pa rnam skrag rnam snang cod pan thogs //
analyzed: gdug pa rnam skrag rnam snang cod pan thogs //
translated: terrifying the wicked, with a crown of Vairocana,

original: dur khrod rgyan dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: dur khrod rgyan dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one adorned with charnel ground ornaments.

original: ai las byung ba'i gsang ba'i goo r'i ma //
analyzed: ai las byung ba'i gsang ba'i goo r'i ma //
translated: The one born from ī, the secret Gaurī,

original: gzi brjid mi mtshungs gar ldan ro mchog myang //
analyzed: gzi brjid mi mtshungs gar ldan ro mchog myang //
translated: with incomparable splendor, dancing, tasting the supreme taste,🔽realizing the ultimate truth, with the jewel crest,

original: don dam thugs chud dbu rgyan rin chen tog / spyan gsum thod rlon can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: don dam thugs chud dbu rgyan rin chen tog / spyan gsum thod rlon can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: and three eyes, wearing a fresh elephant skin—I pay homage.

original: a'a li k'a li'i snyoms 'jug rnal 'byor ma //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li'i snyoms 'jug rnal 'byor ma //
translated: The yoginī who is the union of Ī and Ū,

original: bde la rtag dgyes byang chub sems kyi ngang //
analyzed: bde la rtag dgyes byang chub sems kyi ngang //
translated: always delighted in bliss, the essence of bodhicitta,

original: 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan a'i las skyes //
analyzed: 'od dpag med kyis dbu brgyan a'i las skyes //
translated: with the crown of Amitābha, born from the syllable ām,

original: gar gyis dgyes pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: gar gyis dgyes pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one who delights in dance.

original: au las byung ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
analyzed: au las byung ba'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma //
translated: The one born from ū, the Vajraḍākinī,🔽the supreme action of Tārā, purifying the three realms,

original: khams gsum dag byed sgrol ma las kyi mchog / don grub dbu brgyan chags pa'i spyan dang ldan //
analyzed: khams gsum dag byed sgrol ma las kyi mchog / don grub dbu brgyan chags pa'i spyan dang ldan //
translated: with the crown of Amoghasiddhi, and passionate eyes,

original: mtshungs med chags par ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mtshungs med chags par ldan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the one endowed with incomparable passion.

original: skye med chos dbyings rnam dag pukka s'i //
analyzed: skye med chos dbyings rnam dag pukka s'i //
translated: The pure space of phenomena, unborn, is Pukkasī,

original: mi bskyod dbu brgyan dri ma dag mdzad cing //
analyzed: mi bskyod dbu brgyan dri ma dag mdzad cing //
translated: with the crown of Akṣobhya, purifying stains,🔽and the essence of the great bliss of the vajra realm,🔽I pay homage to the one born from the syllable u.

original: au las skyes pa brgya phyed phreng ba 'dzin //
analyzed: au las skyes pa brgya phyed phreng ba 'dzin //
translated: Born from u, the one with a garland of a hundred and fifty,

original: 'jig rten zhi mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jig rten zhi mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, Śāntikara of the world.

original: dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i ri khrod ma //
analyzed: dus gsum 'dus ma byas pa'i ri khrod ma //
translated: The one born in the mountain of the unconditioned three times,

original: spros bral dri med rnam snang dbu la bzhugs //
analyzed: spros bral dri med rnam snang dbu la bzhugs //
translated: Free from elaborations, stainless, with Vairocana on the crown of the head,

original: ri las 'khrungs pa gar gyis phyogs bcur gzigs //
analyzed: ri las 'khrungs pa gar gyis phyogs bcur gzigs //
translated: Born from the mountain, dancing, looking in the ten directions,

original: chu zla dang mtshungs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: chu zla dang mtshungs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are like the moon in water.

original: gnas dang nye gnas la sogs bgrod mdzad cing //
analyzed: gnas dang nye gnas la sogs bgrod mdzad cing //
translated: Moving through the abodes, the nearby abodes, and so on,

original: 'du byed ma lus sreg mdzad tsandal'i //
analyzed: 'du byed ma lus sreg mdzad tsandal'i //
translated: The one who burns all conditioned things without exception, Caṇḍālī,

original: rin chen dbu brgyan brjid pas r'i las skyes //
analyzed: rin chen dbu brgyan brjid pas r'i las skyes //
translated: Born from ra, with a jeweled crown, majestic,

original: 'dzag pa gsal mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'dzag pa gsal mdzad ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, the one who clarifies the dripping.

original: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i bdag nyid las //
analyzed: mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i bdag nyid las //
translated: From the nature of nonabiding nirvāṇa,

original: thugs rje skyed mdzad g-yo ba'i dombi n'i //
analyzed: thugs rje skyed mdzad g-yo ba'i dombi n'i //
translated: Compassion arises, the moving dombinī,

original: sgeg mo snang mthas dbu brgyan li las byung //
analyzed: sgeg mo snang mthas dbu brgyan li las byung //
translated: Born from li, with a jeweled crown, graceful,

original: mkha' ltar dri med sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mkha' ltar dri med sku la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, whose body is stainless like space.

original: shin tu grag pa'i brda yi skad sbyor zhing //
analyzed: shin tu grag pa'i brda yi skad sbyor zhing //
translated: The one who speaks with the language of sound that is very audible,

original: ru dhi ra dang aantra la rtag dgyes //
analyzed: ru dhi ra dang aantra la rtag dgyes //
translated: Always delighted in Rudra and Antra.

original: zhe sdang rdo rjes dbu brgyan l'i las skyes //
analyzed: zhe sdang rdo rjes dbu brgyan l'i las skyes //
translated: Born from the syllable LA, she is crowned with Dveṣavajrā.

original: goo r'i phyogs bcur gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: goo r'i phyogs bcur gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to Gaurī, who looks in the ten directions.

original: chos nyid gsal ba'i yum gyur chom rkun ma //
analyzed: chos nyid gsal ba'i yum gyur chom rkun ma //
translated: The mother who illuminates reality is Caṇḍālī.

original: mi rtog mnyam nyid 'gro ba'i don la brtson //
analyzed: mi rtog mnyam nyid 'gro ba'i don la brtson //
translated: She is nonconceptual, of the same nature, and strives for the benefit of beings.

original: dbu rgyan gti mug rdo rje mi 'gyur rtags //
analyzed: dbu rgyan gti mug rdo rje mi 'gyur rtags //
translated: Born from the syllable AI, she is crowned with Mohavajrā, the sign of immutability.

original: ae las bskyed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ae las bskyed pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to her.

original: 'jig rten ma lus chags las dbang du mdzad //
analyzed: 'jig rten ma lus chags las dbang du mdzad //
translated: She brings all worlds under control through passion.

original: dpal ldan gzi brjid skyed mdzad be t'a l'i //
analyzed: dpal ldan gzi brjid skyed mdzad be t'a l'i //
translated: The glorious one who generates splendor is Vetālī.

original: nga rgyal rdo rjes dbu brgyan aee las skyes //
analyzed: nga rgyal rdo rjes dbu brgyan aee las skyes //
translated: Born from the syllable AI, she is crowned with Mānavajrā.

original: snyoms 'jug mi gnas @218b ngang la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: snyoms 'jug mi gnas @218b ngang la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to her, who does not abide in meditative equipoise.

original: shes rab thabs su ldan pa'i gha sma r'i //
analyzed: shes rab thabs su ldan pa'i gha sma r'i //
translated: Ghasmarī is endowed with wisdom and method.

original: de nyid las skyes 'dod chags rdo rjes brgyan //
analyzed: de nyid las skyes 'dod chags rdo rjes brgyan //
translated: Born from that, she is crowned with Rāgavajrā.

original: ao las byung ba drag po las las skyes //
analyzed: ao las byung ba drag po las las skyes //
translated: Born from the syllable O, she is born from the karma family.

original: skye med skye bar bstan la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: skye med skye bar bstan la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to her, who demonstrates birth from the unborn.

original: sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du mkha' la spyod //
analyzed: sgyu ma smig rgyu bzhin du mkha' la spyod //
translated: You move in space like an illusion or a mirage.

original: bar snang mnga' mdzad he ru ka yi ngang //
analyzed: bar snang mnga' mdzad he ru ka yi ngang //
translated: You are the Heruka who rules the intermediate space.

original: cod pan snang ba mtha' yas aoo las skyes //
analyzed: cod pan snang ba mtha' yas aoo las skyes //
translated: Your crown is born from the syllable oṃ of Amitābha.

original: thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, omniscient and all-seeing one.

original: rnam snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan sa 'og spyod //
analyzed: rnam snang mdzad kyis dbu brgyan sa 'og spyod //
translated: You are crowned with Vairocana and move in the underworld.

original: 'og gi 'jig rten ma lus sgrol mdzad ma //
analyzed: 'og gi 'jig rten ma lus sgrol mdzad ma //
translated: You are the one who liberates all the worlds below.

original: aam las byung ba'i dur khrod 'jigs pas brgyan //
analyzed: aam las byung ba'i dur khrod 'jigs pas brgyan //
translated: You are adorned with the terrifying charnel grounds born from the syllable aṃ.

original: thabs mkhas thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thabs mkhas thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, skillful and compassionate one.

original: a'a li k'a li zla ba nyi ma kha sbyor sa 'og rnam par dag pa las //
analyzed: a'a li k'a li zla ba nyi ma kha sbyor sa 'og rnam par dag pa las //
translated: From the union of the moon and sun, the pure underworld,

original: gri gug thod pa la sogs phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa mdzes mdzad cing //
analyzed: gri gug thod pa la sogs phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa mdzes mdzad cing //
translated: You are beautified by the five symbolic ornaments, such as the flaying knife and skull cup.

original: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar ldan gcer bu spyan gsum stag lpags sham thabs can //
analyzed: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar ldan gcer bu spyan gsum stag lpags sham thabs can //
translated: You have a half-crossed posture, are naked, have three eyes, and wear a tiger-skin skirt.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i sku la rtsa gsum sprul mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i sku la rtsa gsum sprul mdzad de la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to you, the one who emanates the three channels in the body of mahāmudrā.

original: bsod nams ye shes chen po las byung sku lnga ye shes lngar ldan 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma //
analyzed: bsod nams ye shes chen po las byung sku lnga ye shes lngar ldan 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma //
translated: The five bodies and five gnoses arisen from great merit and wisdom, you who have a terrifying form,

original: bdag nyid dad pa'i mthu yis rgyu yi yon tan shas tsam mthong nas dad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa yis //
analyzed: bdag nyid dad pa'i mthu yis rgyu yi yon tan shas tsam mthong nas dad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod pa yis //
translated: I, through the power of faith, having seen a mere portion of the qualities of the cause, with a voice of faith, I praise you.

original: khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas pa'i rnam rtog rlung gis rgya mtsho phyogs bcur g-yeng ba rnams //
analyzed: khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gnas pa'i rnam rtog rlung gis rgya mtsho phyogs bcur g-yeng ba rnams //
translated: The winds of conceptuality, which toss the ocean of the three realms of cyclic existence in the ten directions,

original: skye rga na 'chi spangs nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal bla med byang chub thob par shog //
analyzed: skye rga na 'chi spangs nas 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las brgal bla med byang chub thob par shog //
translated: Having abandoned birth, aging, sickness, and death, may I cross the ocean of cyclic existence and attain unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: slob dpon mi thub zla bas mdzad pa'o//
translated: This was composed by the master Durāyudha.
